title: Effect of temperature, hydrogen donor, and zeolites on light cycle oil cracking: Thermodynamic, experimental, and DFT analyses
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00504J, Paper
Akshata Vijay Ramteke, Marvi Kaushik, Divesh Bhatia, Kamal Kishore Pant
This study investigates the thermal and catalytic cracking of light cycle oil (LCO) and its model compounds at ambient pressure, focusing on the effect of temperature, hydrogen donors, and the...
